channel.title: Chest help
channel.description:
So I am making my own mini game and practically done, now I don't want to be the normal kill the last monster and it drops the item, I want to make it after you kill the last monster it teleports you to a room with a chest in it and it spawns a key into your inventory and you can use the key on the chest...
so basically
After I kill the monster I want to be teleported to a room and a key spawned into my inventory that will open the chest and gives my reward.
I know how to make it where if you kill a monster you teleport to another place btw.

item.title: Chest help
item.dc:creator: @army_life army_life
item.description:
@army_life wrote:

So I am making my own mini game and practically done, now I don’t want to be the normal kill the last monster and it drops the item, I want to make it after you kill the last monster it teleports you to a room with a chest in it and it spawns a key into your inventory and you can use the key on the chest…

so basically

After I kill the monster I want to be teleported to a room and a key spawned into my inventory that will open the chest and gives my reward.

I know how to make it where if you kill a monster you teleport to another place btw.
